input.sentences: we took a small trip to the rural lands today .
we saw one that was shaped like a castle .
we even saw this fancy looking one .
overall | we had a great time and saw many amazing buildings .
output.sentences: When we embarked on this trip into the rural areas of the Midwest we had no idea what we'd find.
We encountered some unexpected delights--strange looking buildings.
Even though the building designs were strange they were not unpleasant to look at and one was even shaped like a castle.
Another reminded me of an old state house or a nineteenth century normal school.
As we traveled further we saw glimpses of factories and industrial sites of a bygone era.
